Detailed Description

Describes the encoding parameters like color format, size and quality level.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum JpegEncoder::EncodingParameters::EncodingFormat
 

Encoding format of the JPEG image. The encoding format can be changed by JpegEncoder::SetEncodingFormat. Per default Yuv422 is used.

Enumerator:
Yuv420 
Yuv422 

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

JpegEncoder::EncodingParameters::EncodingParameters (  XYDIM  width,
XYDIM  height,
INT  quality_level,
EncodingFormat  encoding_format = Yuv422
)  [inline]
 

Parameters:
width Output width (is ignored in case of calling Encode with Bindata)
height Output height (is ignored in case of calling Encode with BinData)
quality_level JPEG quality level. 100 means best quality but low compression, 0 means lowest quality but high compression.

Member Function Documentation

EncodingFormat JpegEncoder::EncodingParameters::GetEncodingFormat (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the used encoding format.

INT JpegEncoder::EncodingParameters::GetQualityLevel (   )  const [inline]
 

Retrieves the quality level which has been set for JPEG encoding. 100 means best quality but low compression, 0 means lowest quality but high compression.

void JpegEncoder::EncodingParameters::SetEncodingFormat (  EncodingFormat  format  )  [inline]
 

Sets the used encoding format, which has impacts on the quality and size of the JPEG image.

void JpegEncoder::EncodingParameters::SetQualityLevel (  INT  level  )  [inline]
 

Sets the quality level for JPEG encoding. 100 means best quality but low compression, 0 means lowest quality but high compression.
